title: Online Hybrid Teaching Methodology Application: Nursing Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Blended educational environment operating in a smartphone-centric restricted technology setting, where learners in administrator/leader roles use online learning platforms and mobile apps concurrently; requires enhanced activity-based learning linked to wellness education

learning_goals: By combining online lecture-based instruction with activity-based learning, learners explain nursing management theory with over 80% comprehension.
Via wellness education modules, learners propose and practice three or more job-related stress management strategies.
Using mobile-based collaboration tools, learners conduct five or more online discussions and case analyses with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
